Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

geoidep 0.3.0

CRAN release: 2024-09-22

  • New functions for download Serfor data (#6 y #7)
    • get_forest_fire_data()
    • get_hotspots_data()
  • Fixed issue #1 and #2
  • New vigette (#7)

geoidep 0.2.0

CRAN release: 2024-09-19

  • New functions for download Midagri data
    • get_midagri_data()
  • New functions for download Sernanp data
    • get_sernanp_data()
  • New functions for download Geobosque data
    • get_forest_loss_data()
    • get_early_warning()
  • Add base functions for geoidep
    • get_providers()
    • get_data_sources()
  • Updated vignette
  • Fixed GitHub actions

geoidep 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2024-09-05

  • Initial CRAN release
  • New functions to download INEI’s political administrative boundaries
    • get_districts()
    • get_provinces()
    • get_departaments()
  • Simple vignette
  • Construction of a website for geoidep
